Room.Name: Nyyron Trail
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the northern Nyrron trail, walking beside the Nyyron Creek.
Room.LongDescription: To the south the trail continues out of sight around a great boulder, while to the north you see a recent avalanch has wiped out part of the path. The mountain sides here are steep and rugged, and slides occur often. If you follow the creek, however, it should take you back to the trail.
